id: Notion Cover Pack - Light & Dark Landscape
name: Notion Cover Pack - Light & Dark Landscape
description: Introducing "Elegant Horizons: A Notion Cover Pack". This collection of seven unique cover images brings the beauty of the natural world right to your digital workspace. Each cover is meticulously crafted with a minimalist line art style, showcasing a different aspect of our stunning environment.The pack includes:MountainForestWavesAnimalsFlowersSkylineSunriseEach design comes in both a light and dark version, allowing you to choose the style that best suits your mood or preference.
